title: Check Ping Before Game
body: Recently I have been experiencing very inconsistent and high ping in game. My ping is constantly changing and is anywhere from 45-700 (but usually around 200) I am wondering if there is any way to accurately check your ping before game. I've seen here and on Reddit that pinging 104.160.131.1 should give it to your. However when i do this it always gives me about 35 and in game i get way more than that. Even if i ping that ip while lagging a ton in game it still shows 35. So is there any other way to do this?

replies.body: It sounds like your sudden change in ping is happening only in game as a result of packet loss, and we can use some tools to figure out what's going wrong.  Run a[ log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get some more context on your specific issue, which will also offer troubleshooting steps.  Let me know what you come up with!
I did one and my packet loss has been really high. The average that it was at for my most recent game was 4.5% so what can I do to reduce the packet loss?

In addition to the steps that the log reader should provide, I also recommend going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve this.  Let me know if you continue to have issues, and we can dig deeper.
